title: "Whats with the glitter?"  Off the wall rant.
message:
Like many of you I crawl around MacBook boards all day under a microscope and we find lots of things, Cat hair, human hair, dirt, water damage but Glitter?

Why do I always find either little gold, purple, red and some times green pieces of glitter. These particles are quite small. About the size of a 01005 resistor solder pad.
I am wondering if you guys find this glitter? Is our world being polluted with micro plastic glitter and MacBook fans just suck it in? Maybe I am the only person who finds glitter?

Please share your Glitter finds!

title: "Whats with the glitter?"  Off the wall rant.
"Whats with the glitter?"  Off the wall rant.
message: Green Glitter.   You can really see it with the 30x eye pieces installed!

title: "Whats with the glitter?"  Off the wall rant.
message: Found some glitter on a SSD today.  was a 820-00164 board.  Where the hell does all this glitter come from and what are we doing to our planet.

title: "Whats with the glitter?"  Off the wall rant.
message: Found some RED HOT smc glitter today.  on a 820-3435-A
